original_title: The Exhibitionist 2: Women In The Wild
overview: These exhibitionists are taking girl on girl sex to the great outdoors! Escape with 5 beautiful lesbian pairings for the ultimate outdoor ecstasy and the thrill of the wild. Artfully crafted scenes and unparalleled displays of lust await in The Exhibitionist 2: Women in the Wild. "The Sea Mousse' starring Whitney Conroy & Lorena B aka Lorena Garcia. "Memories" starring Cayla Lyons aka Kayla Lyon & Sandy Ambrosia. "Horizon" starring Ariel Piper Fawn & Lorena. "Night for Two" starring Paula Shy & Jenny Apach. "Shards of Summer" starring Tracy Lindsay & Aiko Bell.
title: The Exhibitionist 2: Women In The Wild
